pr_title: YARN-10538: Add RECOMMISSIONING nodes to the list of updated nodes returned to the AM

timeline.message: YARN-10538: Add RECOMMISSIONING nodes to the list of updated nodes returned to the AM

timeline.bodyText:
Cosmetic:
Can you add a comment maybe suggesting that you're marking recommissioning nodes as usable or maybe even why you're marking them as usable. Just a thought.
timeline.author: surnaik
